plants.name: Monstera Borsigiana Albo Variegated
plants.description: The Variegated Monstera Borsigiana Albo is a coveted plant which is grown by our experienced staff is sure to please. This is a rooted plant, not a cutting. With stunning white variegation this monstera can also produce half moon leaves. This plant is classified as high variegation.

plants.name: Monstera Aurea
plants.description: Monstera Aurea, also known as Monstera Marmorata, is a variegated cultivar of the classic variegated Monstera deliciosa. It, basically, is a more stunning variety of the popular Monstera deliciosa plant. The lemon and lime, and dark-green variegation occur in a similar pattern to what you‚Äôd expect to find on Monstera Albo, with blocks and splashes of variegation and some leaves that are solidly half and half. This is also called the half-moon variegation. Its leaves are a glorious, devastatingly perfect split; one emerald green, the other a yellowish
